text: Kamen Rider W (also known as Kamen Rider Double), is a 2009-2010 Japanese tokusatsu drama. ==Schedule== Super Hero Time aired alongside Samurai Sentai Shinkenger and then Tensou Sentai Goseiger. ==Cast== * Shotaro Hidari / Kamen Rider W: Renn Kiriyama * Phillip / Kamen Rider W: Masaki Suda * Akiko Narumi: Hikaru Yamamoto * Ryu Terui / Kamen Rider Accel: Minehiro Kinomoto * Mikio Jinno: Takeshi Nadagi * Shun Makura: Shingo Nakagawa * Watcherman: Nasubi * Santa: Zennosuke Fukkin * Queen: Tomomi Itano (AKB48) * Elizabeth: Tomomi Kasai (AKB48) * Ryubee Sonozaki: Minori Terada * Saeko Sonozaki: Ami Namai * Wakana Sonozaki: Rin Asuka * Kirihiko Sudo/Sonozaki: Yuki Kimisawa * Shinkuro Isaka: Dan Tomoyuki * Jun Kazu: Gong Teyu * Narration, Gaia Memory Voice: Fumihiko Tachiki ===Guest cast=== * Marina Tsumura (1, 2): Meibi Yamanouchi * Taizo Kaga (3, 4): Tatsuya Gashuin * Chizuru Hoshino (7, 8): Reina Fujii * Dango Inamoto (7, 8): Win Morisaki * Ikari (7, 8): Jin Katagiri * Teacher (7, 8): Hiroshi Watari * Mai Asakawa (9, 10, 14): Eri Otoguro * Kurosu (11, 12): KOJI * Young girl (12): Hikari Kajiwara * Motoko Saeki (13, 14): Shion Nakamaru * Kenji Kurata (15, 16): Koichiro Nishi * Aya Kujo (21, 22): Ayumi Kinoshita * Lily Shirogane (27, 28): Nao Nagasawa * Himeka Yukimura (29, 30): Natsuko Asō * Sokichi Narumi (31): Koji Kikkawa * Yukie Sudo (33, 34): Kaoru Hirata * Nagi Shimamoto (35, 36): Miyuu Wagawa * Grasshopper Woman (37, 38): Minami Tsukui * Ai Nijimura (39, 40): Erika Yazawa * Toru Kawai (39, 40): Naoki Kawano * Kyoko Todoroki (45, 46): Yuka Hirata ===Movie War 2010 cast=== * Asami Mutsuki: Asuka Shibuya * Erika Mutsuki: Miyuu Sawai ===A to Z/The Gaia Memories of Fate cast=== * Katsumi Saido / Kamen Rider Eternal: Mitsuru Matsuoka * Maria S. Cranberry: Aya Sugimoto * Kyosui Izumi: Genki Sudo * Reika Hanehara: Minase Yashiro * Ken Ashihara: Masayuki Deai * Gozo Domoto: Koji Nakamura * Eiji Hino (Cameo): Shu Watanabe ===Movie War Core title: Kamen Rider W
